LanguageData.Cloning_Mutations_Description: If enabled, clones have a random chance of gaining a random (usually negative) gene, representing undesired mutations, up to a maximum number. This is meant to help balance how powerful it is to be able to clone freely.
LanguageData.Cloning_Settings_CloneXenogenes_Tooltip: If enabled, clones will also inherit the donor pawn's entire xenogene set.
LanguageData.Cloning_Settings_MutationsXenogenes_Tool: If enabled, mutations are added as xenogenes, meaning they are not inherited if the clone has a child and they can be removed by gene-modding the clone later on.
LanguageData.Cloning_Settings_GeneListHeader: Genes eligible to be added by mutations
LanguageData.Cloning_Letter_MutationText: A clone embryo has finished gestating and gained these genetic mutations:
LanguageData.Cloning_InsertPersonBrainScanDesc: Insert a pawn to extract a brain scan that can be applied to another pawn to overwrite their consciousness.
LanguageData.Cloning_ExtractorWorking: Extraction process is already running. Cancel to change modes.
LanguageData.InsertBrainScanCloneVatDesc: Insert a brain scan into this clone vat to be applied to any pawns inside.
LanguageData.CancelBrainScanDesc: Cancel loading the selected brain scan into this clone vat or remove it if it has already been installed.
LanguageData.BrainScanAlreadyInside: There is already a brain scan installed
LanguageData.WaitingForBrainScan: Waiting for brain scan to be delivered
LanguageData.EjectCloneDesc: Remove the pawn currently inside the clone storage vat.
LanguageData.ApplyBrainScanDesc:
Applies the stored consciousness in the contained brain scan onto the contained pawn.
Completely overwrites the person's entire sentient personality.

Seems painful.
LanguageData.ConfirmBrainScanApplication:
Warning: {PAWN_nameDef}'s entire consciousness will be destroyed and overwritten with the contents of the brain scan.
This process cannot be undone. The previous sentient mind is lost forever! 

Are you sure you wish to continue?
LanguageData.InsertCloneDesc: Insert a person into the clone storage vat. They will be put into cryptosleep suspension and can have a brain scan applied to them while inside.
LanguageData.CancelLoadPawnDesc: Cancel loading this with the selected people
LanguageData.CancelScanApplicationDesc: Stops the current process of applying a brain scan to the contained pawn before completion.
LanguageData.FromDonorXenotype: Added by donor xenotype. Remove the entire xenotype to remove.
LanguageData.ClickToRemove: Click to add or remove all of donor's xenogenes
LanguageData.IsEndogeneTooltip: Germline gene from donor, cannot remove
